title: Flipped Learning-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: VR scenario-based learning environment for real-life problem-solving with personalized feedback system via LMS log data analysis

learning_goals: Learners identify three or more of their own learning strategies by analyzing LMS log data in a flipped learning environment.
Learners design step-by-step processes for solving math problems and establish execution plans using simulation/VR tools.
Learners accurately apply problem-solving strategies required in real workplaces with ≥80% accuracy through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
